name: Safari Rescue (itch)
description:
You are a conservationist who has dedicated your life to protecting animals. Dressed in your safari gear, you venture through different biomes like the Savana Dessert, the Tropical Rainforest, the Bamboo Forest, and the Grasslands in your efforts to save and release captured animals while getting rid of an poachers you meet along the way. Collect the crates to free the animals, but beware of the poisonous bugs, as one sting is fatal!

Controls:

Left & right arrow keys to move.

Spacebar to jump (press twice to double jump)

F key to shoot

Hold shift while moving to run faster

*All sounds and music used found on Freesound.org. Thanks to the website and all there who uploaded these soundtracks and made them free to use!*
